Articles.Content:
I've seen several people post screenshots that look like this:

![tWxbCDZ.png](http://i.imgur.com/tWxbCDZ.png)

Is there a mod that displays the info in the bottom right when you take a screenshot or is it post editing by the user?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-07T22:02:44Z" title="08/07/2015 10:02  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 7, 2015</time> by Sippyfrog**

The mod is called Historian. You can find it here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122062-1-0-4-Historian-%28v1-1-1%29-Dynamic-Screenshot-Captions-August-5th-2015](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122062-1-0-4-Historian-%28v1-1-1%29-Dynamic-Screenshot-Captions-August-5th-2015)
